00040 #ifndef CONVERSIONUTILS_H
00041 #define CONVERSIONUTILS_H
00042 
00043 #include <kdl/frames.hpp>
00044 #include <kdl/path_line.hpp>
00045 #include <kdl/path_composite.hpp>
00046 #include <kdl/trajectory_composite.hpp>
00047 #include <kdl/rotational_interpolation_sa.hpp>
00048 
00049 #include <navigation_trajectory_msgs/Trajectory.h>
00050 #include <geometry_msgs/PoseStamped.h>
00051 #include <geometry_msgs/Pose.h>
00052 #include <geometry_msgs/Twist.h>
00053 
00054 #include <vector>
00055 #include <iostream>
00056 
00057 class ConversionUtils {
00058 public:
00059 
00060     void poseRosToKdl(const geometry_msgs::Pose& poseROS, KDL::Frame& poseKDL) {
00061 
00062         const geometry_msgs::Pose::_position_type& positionRef = poseROS.position;
00063         const geometry_msgs::Pose::_orientation_type& orientationRef = poseROS.orientation;
00064         KDL::Vector origin(positionRef.x, positionRef.y, positionRef.z);
00065         KDL::Rotation orientation(KDL::Rotation::Quaternion(orientationRef.x, orientationRef.y, orientationRef.z, orientationRef.w));
00066 
00067         poseKDL = KDL::Frame(orientation, origin);
00068 
00069     }
00070 
00071     void poseKdlToRos(const KDL::Frame& poseKDL, geometry_msgs::Pose& poseROS) {
00072 
00073         geometry_msgs::Pose::_position_type& position = poseROS.position;
00074         geometry_msgs::Pose::_orientation_type& orientation = poseROS.orientation;
00075 
00076         poseKDL.M.GetQuaternion(orientation.x, orientation.y, orientation.z, orientation.w);
00077         position.x = poseKDL.p.x();
00078         position.y = poseKDL.p.y();
00079         position.z = poseKDL.p.z();
00080 
00081     }
00082 
00083     void twistRosToKdl(const geometry_msgs::Twist& twistROS, KDL::Twist& twistKDL) {
00084         twistKDL = KDL::Twist(KDL::Vector(twistROS.linear.x, twistROS.linear.y, twistROS.linear.z),
00085                 KDL::Vector(twistROS.angular.x, twistROS.angular.y, twistROS.angular.z));
00086     }
00087 
00088     void twistKdlToRos(const KDL::Twist& twistKDL, geometry_msgs::Twist& twistROS) {
00089         twistROS.angular.x = twistKDL.rot.x();
00090         twistROS.angular.y = twistKDL.rot.y();
00091         twistROS.angular.z = twistKDL.rot.z();
00092 
00093         twistROS.linear.x = twistKDL.vel.x();
00094         twistROS.linear.y = twistKDL.vel.y();
00095         twistROS.linear.z = twistKDL.vel.z();
00096     }
00097 
00098     void pathRosToKdl(const std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& poseStampedArray, KDL::Path_Composite& path) {
00099         std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>::const_iterator it;
00100 
00101         if (poseStampedArray.size() > 1) {
00102 
00103             geometry_msgs::PoseStamped p1 = poseStampedArray.front();
00104             geometry_msgs::PoseStamped p2;
00105 
00106             for (it = poseStampedArray.begin() + 1; it != poseStampedArray.end(); ++it) {
00107                 p2 = *it;
00108                 KDL::Frame f1, f2;
00109                 poseRosToKdl(p1.pose, f1);
00110                 poseRosToKdl(p2.pose, f2);
00111 
00112                 KDL::Path_Line* pathLine = new KDL::Path_Line(f1, f2, new KDL::RotationalInterpolation_SingleAxis(), 0.1);
00113                 path.Add(pathLine);
00114 
00115                 p1 = p2;
00116             }
00117 
00118         }
00119 
00120     }
00121 
00122     void pathKdlToRos(const KDL::Path_Composite& path, std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& poseStampedArray) {
00123 
00124 
00125     }
00126 
00127     void trajectoryRosToKdl(const std::vector <nav_msgs::Odometry>& trajectoryROS, KDL::Trajectory& trajectroyKDL, double dt) {
00128 
00129     }
00130 
00131     void trajectoryKdlToRos(const KDL::Trajectory& trajectroyKDL, std::vector <nav_msgs::Odometry>& trajectoryROS, double dt) {
00132         double duration = trajectroyKDL.Duration();
00133 
00134         if (duration > 0.0 && dt > 0.0) {
00135 
00136             for (double time = 0; time <= duration; time += dt) {
00137                 KDL::Frame poseKDL = trajectroyKDL.Pos(time);
00138                 KDL::Twist twistKDL = trajectroyKDL.Vel(time);
00139 
00140                 geometry_msgs::Pose poseROS;
00141                 geometry_msgs::Twist twistROS;
00142 
00143                 poseKdlToRos(poseKDL, poseROS);
00144                 twistKdlToRos(twistKDL, twistROS);
00145 
00146                 nav_msgs::Odometry odom;
00147                 odom.pose.pose = poseROS;
00148                 odom.twist.twist = twistROS;
00149 
00150                 trajectoryROS.push_back(odom);
00151             }
00152         }
00153     }
00154 
00155 };
00156 #endif  /* CONVERSIONUTILS_H */
